title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 540.0 - Preamble
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 540.0 - Preamble

State Regulations

Acting pursuant to the rulemaking authority
invested in this Court by New York Constitution, article VI, section 30 and

Laws of 1995, chapter 1, section 20, the Court of Appeals establishes these

Uniform Procedures for Appeals from pretrial findings of mental retardation in
capital cases. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
540.0

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
